backend/main.mo: Main backend canister implementing user profiles, access control, and CRUD operations for surgery cases with tasks, notes, and sync timestamps.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old surgery case data to a new format by adding an empty notes field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to the frontend files and components implementing them.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated summaries describing behavior and purpose of various frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_NOTES.md: Instructions for when and how to redeploy the frontend to ensure correct backend bindings.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color tokens, dark mode values, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entrypoint loading the React application.
frontend/redeploy.sh: Script performing deterministic frontend redeploy including rebuild and canister info display.
Script that removes stale artifacts, reinstalls dependencies, regenerates bindings, and rebuilds the frontend.
frontend/scripts/verify-live-backend-bin: Guide for confirming the deployed frontend is using up‑to‑date backend bindings.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling auth, backend connection, case CRUD modals, profile setup, and overall layout.
frontend/src/components/cases/CameraCapt: Empty placeholder file for future camera capture functionality.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseCard.t: Displays a surgery case card with metadata, task toggling, edit actions, and delete confirmation.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Form for creating or editing a surgery case with prefill logic, demographics handling, and task setup.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseList.t: Filters, sorts, and displays surgery cases, handling loading states and empty results.
Reusable date input with text entry and popover calendar selection.
frontend/src/components/cases/Demographi: Textarea that extracts demographics from pasted text and feeds it to the form.
frontend/src/components/cases/EmptyCases: Shows guidance or placeholders when no cases exist, including migration instructions.
frontend/src/components/cases/SortContro: Provides UI controls to select a sort field and toggle ascending/descending order.
frontend/src/components/cases/TasksCheck: Shows required, incomplete tasks with checkboxes and optional colored borders, allowing toggling task status.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvExportBut: Exports all stored cases to a CSV file and shows toast notifications for success or failure.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvImportDia: Handles CSV upload, parsing, validation, and importing cases into the store with progress and error handling.
frontend/src/components/errors/BackendCo: Displays a troubleshooting alert with retry actions and guidance when backend connection fails.
frontend/src/components/errors/ModalErro: Error boundary for modal content that logs details and shows a fallback UI with a close button.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the app footer with year, branding, and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with app branding and login/logout handling using Internet Identity and environment labels.
frontend/src/components/startup/StartupR: Recovery screen shown on startup errors with guidance and actions to retry or reload the page.
frontend/src/components/sync/SyncStatusB: UI bar showing online status, backend connectivity, and a sync button with toast feedback. Handles sync execution and retrying backend connection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, reinitializing on identity changes. Invalidates dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wraps useActor with error detection and retry logic for failed actor initialization. Tracks initialization attempts and surfaces classified errors.
Combines identity, actor, and a connectivity probe to determine backend connection status. Provides retry behavior and consolidated connection errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useCasesStore.ts: Manages merged surgery cases from local storage and server using React Query. Supports adding, updating, and deleting cases with local persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnvironmentLabel.t: Determines whether the app is running in Draft or Live mode based on hostname heuristics.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login, and logout via AuthClient with controlled lifecycle and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using navigator events and returns a boolean.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and surgery cases with authorization-aware error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSync.ts: Implements local-to-server case syncing, merging, normalization, and error reporting using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function for merging Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/types/cases.ts: Type definitions for local surgery cases and form data extending backend case structures.
Maps backend errors into categorized, user-friendly messages with authorization, network, and initialization detection.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: CSV import/export utilities for surgery cases including parsing, validation, warnings, and task-column handling.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Date-only and nanosecond conversion helpers ensuring timezone-safe formatting and validation.
frontend/src/utils/demographicsExtract.t: Extracts patient demographics from free text using regex and fallback heuristics, returning a best‑effort structured object.
frontend/src/utils/draftAdminToken.ts: Retrieves and validates a persisted Draft admin token from the URL or sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/localPersistence.ts: Loads, saves, and clears locally stored surgery cases with bigint handling and field normalization.
frontend/src/utils/mergeCases.ts: Merges local and server surgery cases while preserving local‑only fields and prepares pending local changes for sync.
frontend/src/utils/prefill.ts: Finds the most recent case by MRN and extracts demographic fields for form prefilling.
frontend/src/utils/tasksChecklist.ts: Defines task metadata and provides helpers to create, normalize, and query task checklists for cases.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash‑based routing awareness.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, extensions, plugins, and color system with OKLCH variables.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature lists, new requests, and known build issues for the Surgery Case Tracker. Indicates pending work on notes fields, UI highlights, and a failed build retry.
